name: Hunter Beast
cooked: Great work so far. One question – How are the new signature algorithms expected to be used? Will you use a new address type? If so, do you think you would be able to meet the P2QRH BIP? It seems you’ve selected the same algorithms the BIP specifies, which is good, but there are still some details that are unclear.
topic_title: Implemented Post-Quantum Cryptography (PQC) Feature into Bitcoin Core!
topic_html_title: Implemented Post-Quantum Cryptography (PQC) Feature into Bitcoin Core!
raw: Great work so far. One question -- How are the new signature algorithms expected to be used? Will you use a new address type? If so, do you think you would be able to meet the P2QRH BIP? It seems you've selected the same algorithms the BIP specifies, which is good, but there are still some details that are unclear.
